alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 31 at 2:58PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 600 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 256 PM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over north and east Kauai with the heaviest rain near Wailua and Kapaa. Rain was falling at a rate of up to 2 inches per hour. Additional heavy showers will be possible through the afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lihue, Kapaa, Princeville, Kilauea, North Fork Wailua Trails, Wailua Homesteads, Hanalei, Wailua, Moloaa, Wainiha, Anahola, Haena, Na Pali State Park, Kokee State Park, Kalihiwai, Wailua River State Park, Kealia, Hanamaulu and Puhi. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 600 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
